name: Nothing Happened 2: The Ritual
description:
A slice-of-life kinetic visual novel and the sequel to the Global Game Jam 2015 entry, Nothing Happened.

Story

The genius and his female AR companion are back at the Ateneo de Manila University, tasked with something that mostly resembles a ritual.

Global Game Jam page: http://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/nothing-happened-2-ritual
